protocol.description: Transport protocol for the syslog listener.

host.description: Address to bind the syslog listener.

port.description: Port to bind the syslog listener (default 1514 to avoid root requirement).

source.description: Source identifier used in emitted events.

maxMessageSize.description: Maximum syslog message size in bytes.

parseRfc.description: Which RFC format to parse. 'auto' detects per message.
